name: Whopper
description: Our signature flame-grilled patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Whopper
description: Flame-grilled chicken patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Veg Whopper
description: A 100% veg patty, topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Royale
description: Crispy chicken breast with lettuce and creamy mayo on a sesame seed bun.

name: Crispy Veg
description: A crisp veggie patty, topped with fresh lettuce and creamy mayo.

name: Fries (Medium)
description: Thick cut salted fries, golden on the outside and fluffy on the inside.

name: Fries (Large)
description: Thick cut salted fries, golden on the outside and fluffy on the inside.

name: Chicken Fries
description: Breaded, crispy chicken strips shaped like fries.

name: BK Sundae
description: Soft serve ice cream topped with chocolate fudge.

name: Whopper Meal Deal
description: 1 Veg or Chicken Whopper + 1 Medium Fries + 1 Pepsi.

name: Family Feast
description: 2 Whoppers + 2 Medium Fries + 2 Pepsis + 1 Onion Rings.
